title: NYC Entrepreneurship Night: The Future of Food Sustainability
desc: Join Columbia Engineering and University alumni, faculty, students, and friends for? Columbia Entrepreneurship Night in NYC. T he 10th installment of our popular entrepreneurship series  (hosted in? partnership ?with  Columbia Alumni Association ?and  Columbia Entrepreneurship ) ?is designed to provide an insider?s perspective on the future of food sustainability. All Columbia ?alumni are invited to the? Metropolitan Pavilion ?for this captivating talk and night of networking.? ? Dean? Mary C. Boyce ?of Columbia Engineering will moderate a discussion with?Columbia University Professor Emeritus? Dickson Despommier , American Halal/Saffron Roads CEO? Adnan Durrani '81SEAS , AeroFarms Founder? David Rosenberg '02BUS , and GSR Ventures Managing Director? Sonny Wu . ? ? Following the program, alumni will have the chance to meet and network in an open reception featuring the latest crop of new ventures founded by Columbia students, alumni, and faculty. ? Click here ?to see bios of our speakers and the demo teams. ?? Tickets are $20 in advance and $30 at the door (space permitting) and include a limited open bar and hors d'oeuvres. ?Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferrable after 9:00am EST on Wednesday, December 2.
